pages.text: The Filing Index is an advanced block that connects to multiple Filing Cabinets within a specific range, allowing you to access all linked cabinets from a single interface.

$(thing)Features:$()$(br)$(li)Base radius: 8 blocks (upgradable to 16)$(li)Base connection capacity: 64 cabinets (upgradable to 128)$(li)Visual indicators show how many cabinets are connected$(li)Shift-right-click to open GUI$(li)Right-click with Index Card to create a linked Index Card

pages.title: Linking Cabinets
pages.text: To link a Filing Cabinet to your Index:$(br)1. Right-click on the Index with an Index Card$(br)2. Take the linked card to your Filing Cabinet$(br)3. Right-click on the cabinet with the card. The Index card will be inserted into the cabinet$(br)$(br)The cabinet is now part of your network!

pages.title: Breaking an Index
pages.text: When you break a Filing Index, all Filing Cabinets linked to it will drop their Index Cards where the Filing Index was broken, unlinked for reuse.

pages.title: Range Visualization
pages.text: When you open the Filing Index GUI, you'll see a small dot in the top-right corner. Click this to toggle the range visualization, which shows the area where cabinets can be connected to the index.
